root.name: Scooby-Doo: Showdown in Ghost Town
root.description: Plot Scooby-Doo and the Gang are travelling through the desert, when Scooby and Shaggy propose to stop and have a meal. They come to a stop in a ghost town, and soon enough find out that it's being haunted by a Faceless Rider. Gameplay The gameplay is pretty much the same point and click adventure style as in other games in the series, but there are some Western-themed minigames, such as a pie-fight minigame with the Faceless Rider himself. There are also such locales within the game as a Saloon, Graveyard, Post Office and more. System Requirements Windows 95/98/Me or XP166MHz MMX Pentium or higher 32MB of RAM 40MB free hard disk space8X speed CD-ROM drive 16-bit color display set to 640x480 resolution 16-bit sound card compatibility SpeakersMouse
